abstract: The German software maker SAP said Tuesday that it had agreed to buy OutlookSoft, a planning, budgeting, forecasting, and consolidation software maker that competes with Oracle.
lead_paragraph: The German software maker SAP said Tuesday that it had agreed to buy OutlookSoft, a planning, budgeting, forecasting, and consolidation software maker that competes with Oracle.

headline.main: SAP Buys OutlookSoft to Advance in Battle Against Oracle
